categories: Category:Sith Lords of the reconstituted Sith Empire

nodes.text: Rasche was a Sith male who was a Sith Lord of the reconstituted Sith Empire during the Galactic War with the Galactic Republic. During the Battle of Ilum, he was stationed in the Imperial base camp.
Lord Rasche first appeared in the 2011 video game Star Wars: The Old Republic by BioWare as the Sith Warrior class trainer on Ilum.
